thread.title: The Bug and Earth Announce New Collaborative Album, Share New Song: Listen | Pitchfork
thread.title_full: The Bug and Earth Announce New Collaborative Album, Share New Song: Listen | Pitchfork

title: The Bug and Earth Announce New Collaborative Album, Share New Song: Listen | Pitchfork
text:
The Bug and Earth Announce New Collaborative Album, Share New Song: Listen “Snakes Vs Rats” is taken from Concrete Desert 
The Bug (Kevin Martin) and Earth (led by Dylan Carlson) are releasing a new album together as the Bug Vs Earth. It’s called Concrete Desert , and it’s out March 24 via Ninja Tune . The full-length follows the collaborative 2014 EP Boa / Cold. The announcement is accompanied by a new track called “Snakes Vs Rats.” Stream the song below. Concrete Desert will be packaged with a bonus 12” featuring collaborations with Justin Broadrick (of Jesu and Godflesh, appearing as JK Flesh). Kevin Martin’s last album as the Bug was 2014’s Angels & Demons . Earth’s last album, Primitive and Deadly , was also released in 2014. 
Watch the Bug’s “Kill Them / Louder” video on Pitchfork.tv: Artists In This Story
